EL is simple enough as it is without this being linked in IMO. You have the option of using the orbital construction mod to do exactly what your talking about tho.

Sadly this is still completely broken.

Symmetry is utterly borked, instead of placing tanks in a ring round each other horizontally with the tanks pointing up as normal it places them through the vertical axis of the object end to end to form a square, snap to makes no difference at all.

If you switch to SPH mode it does it kind of correctly except if you move the object your trying to place past the vertical center of the object instead of it rotating the symmetry as normal it places them every closer together the further you get away form the vertical axis. ie if I have my cursor at 90deg it places one at 270, if you move the cursor to 80 it puts it at 260 instead of 280.

Surface attachment is very flakey too with many objects, many refuse to attach normally even with the option toggled on or off.

Definitely needs a lot more work.

The Camera wigs out too working on large objects so basically it creates a center invisible ring in the building your in, centred around the normal deployment area which you can't move the model to stopping you zooming in etc, very frustrating.

Edtools used to be installed but was removed just your mod in now, edtools was exhibiting the same behaviour I don't know if you are using similar code, I even tried flipping out the Modded Ksp I'm using for the a clean version to see if its a conflict with another plugin does exactly the same.

In short its completely goosed.
